#include <bits/stdc++.h>
#define _ ios_base::sync_with_stdio(false);cin.tie(0);
using namespace std;
#define pb push_back
#define pob pop_back
#define pf push_front
#define pof pop_front
#define mp make_pair
#define all(a) a.begin(),a.end()
#define bitcnt(x) __builtin_popcountll(x)
#define MOD 1000000007
#define MAXN 100002
#define BASE 31
typedef unsigned long long int uint64;
typedef long long int int64;
 
int arr[100005];
int n;

int main(){
	int t,i,j;
	cin>>t;
	while(t--){
	cin>>n;
	for(i=0;i<n;i++){
		scanf("%d",&arr[i]);
		arr[i]=-1*arr[i];
	}
	for(i=0;i<n;i++)
	printf("%d ",arr[i]);
	printf("\n");
}
	return 0;
}
